price: Que les mécréants ne pensent pas qu’ils Nous ont échappé. Non, ils ne pourront jamais Nous empêcher (de les rattraper à n’importe quel moment).
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
